name: Unconditional Legal Clinic
description: Free in-person legal services in partnership with the SF Bar Association to help our clients access legal services. Legal help from the SF Bar Association will be available for our clients on the 3rd Wednesday of every month from 10:30 am – 12:30 pm. The legal clinic provides immigration, employment, bankruptcy, family law housing law and other legal support services.
